title: 696. 2021 Top NFL QB prospects in college football, Cincinnati's Luke Fickell on building a contender
itunes:title: 696. 2021 Top NFL QB prospects in college football, Cincinnati's Luke Fickell on building a contender
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. To start the show, the hosts discuss top 2021 QB prospects including North Carolina’s Sam Howell, Oklahoma’s Spencer Rattler and Liberty’s Malik Willis, explaining what make these players first round talent. Bucky had a chance to speak with each of these players at this year's Elite 11 competition to ask about the players’ goals for the upcoming season. Next, the duo are joined by Cincinnati Bearcats head coach Luke Fickell to discuss another elite QB prospect in Desmond Ridder as well as Fickell’s process to bring Cincinnati to top-level program status.


Move the Sticks is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
